name: Third Floor (xWilQ)
description:
Max is streaming from a strange building that's overgrown with roots and vines. Only the emergency exit signs shed a dim light in the hallways, as Max explores their surroundings.

Max picks up random items as they cross Max's path. Is Max trying to find a way out of the building? Many doors and hallways are covered in thick roots that Max is not keen on examining closer.

The few people watching the stream encourage Max to move forward and are curious about their whereabouts.

What is this place, why are the walls covered in roots? What does the outside world look like? How did Max end up here?

Credits:

Eli Kaunisvesi, Producer, Writer, Photographer.

Jacob Hagman, Art director.

Linda Honka, Artist, UI Design.

Lucinda Anderson, Artist, Audio, Logo design.

Wiljam Sundström, Programmer.

Featuring art by:

“Stella” by Nicole Hjelt

"Saran wrap elf" by Frankie Sleptsov

Special thanks to Jam Site Organizers
